title: Marriage
verses: Ephesians 5:25 (WEB) — “Husbands, love your wives… as Christ loved the assembly.”
Ephesians 5:33 (WEB) — “Let the wife see that she respects her husband.”
1 Peter 3:7 (WEB) — “Live with your wives according to knowledge… giving honor.”
body: Marriage flourishes with mutual honor, sacrificial love, and quick repentance. Pray together, serve one another, and protect time for delight.
prayer: Lord, fill our marriage with Your love. Teach us to listen, forgive quickly, and serve gladly. Make our covenant a witness to Your grace. Amen.
